typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> moviesCSV
source(output(
		movies as (year as integer, genres as string[], rating as integer, title as string),
		titlekey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'document',
	systemColumns: true,
	throughput: 2000) ~> lookupCosmos
Join1, lookupCosmos lookup(movie == id,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> Lookup1
moviesCSV aggregate(groupBy(titlegrp = title),
	title = first(title)) ~> Aggregate1
moviesCSV select(mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating,
		{Rotton Tomato}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> orig
Aggregate1, orig join(Aggregate1@title == orig@title,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
Lookup1 derive(movies = @(year=toString(year),
		genres=split(genres,'|'),
		rating=toString(toInteger(Rating) * 10),
		movieid=movie,
		title=orig@title)) ~> MakeHierarchy
MakeHierarchy select(mapColumn(
		movies,
		id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		movies as (year as string, genres as string[], rating as string, title as string),
		titlekey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	format: 'document',
	partitionKey: ['/movies/title'],
	throughput: 2000) ~> sink1
